name.description: The category describing the strategy's deposit asset(s).

description.description: The description used for the category.

iconURL.description: The URL to the icon image of the category.

name.description: The category describing the strategy's deposit asset(s).

description.description: The description used for the category.

iconURL.description: The URL to the icon image of the category.

id.description: A unique identifier for the strategy. If the data endpoints for this strategy expect an identifying parameter, this should be exactly that argument.

name.description: The display name for the strategy. Must be unique, but can be changed later if needed.

platform.description: The platform that provides the Earn Strategy.

type.description: Specify the most appropriate method/strategy type to classify the strategy.

method.description: Further classification of the strategy, descriminating between properties such as platform, strategy type, vault type, bond duration, etc.

link.description: This link redirects users to the most appropriate interface for users participate in the strategy.

contract.description: The primary contract for the strategy. Is there are multiple contracts, provide only the contract with which participants interact.

tvl.description: A URL to the data endpoint for the Total Value Locked (TVL) of the strategy. The response must match how it's defined in the documentation.

apr.description: A URL to the data endpoint for the Annual Percentage Rate (APR) of the strategy. The response must match how it's defined in the documentation.

geoblock.description: A URL to the data endpoint for a list of regions that are geographically restricted by the primany interface provider. The response must match how it's defined in the documentation.

lockDuration.description: specify the duration following ISO 8601 standard. If the strategy does not require a lock, use 'P0S' (meaning zero seconds).

riskLevel.description: Determined by the risk report card, and feeds the interface's risk level indicator.

riskReportUrl.description: The link to a Google Sheets page with the strategy's view-only risk report card.

startDateTimeUtc.description: The start date and time (UTC) of a strategy not only keeps record, but can be used to pre-plan and exact time to reveal the on the interface.

unlisted.description: A value of TRUE will hide the strategy on the interface.

disabled.description: A value of TRUE will disable interaction with the strategy via the interface.

message.description: Will display on the interface to communicate an important note about the strategy.

tokenDenoms.description: Describes all assets needed to participate in the strategy.

depositDenoms.description: Describes all deposited assets needed to participate in the strategy.

positionDenoms.description: Describes all assets representing a position in the strategy.

rewardDenoms.description: Describes the assets earned/rewarded for participating in the strategy. This list should include the majority of the earnings, but does not have to be exhaustive.

categories.description: A number of potential categories describing the strategy's deposit asset(s).

coinMinimalDenom.description: The base denom that represents the asset when on Osmosis. E.g., ATOM is 'ibc/27...'--NOT 'uatom'.

_comment.description: An unrestricted, informal field to informs human readers which asset is being described. Asset symbol is likely best.
